author: gballet
content:
Some clarifications here: 
 * 2584 is a proposal for the conversion process, not the format. This EIP has already been discussed on an ACD once and can be discussed again.
 * I am currently working on a draft for the EIP _format_
 * There are three proposals (M1, M2, M3) that are being discussed at https://ethresear.ch/t/binary-trie-format/7621
 * The choice of node format is orthogonal to the conversion method
 * M3, the third proposal, hasn't been abandoned at all
 * I don't think the concern about M3 is a "small implementation detail"
 * None of the methods M1, M2 and M3 require RLP

author: Deleted User
content: I would like us to connect and talk about the concern about M3, I would like to understand it better

author: gballet
content: I was going to expand, also happy to connect

author: gballet
content: To be clear, M3 is also my favorite
